colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010B *, ,(CES RGYAL PO CHEN PO YANG GSANG MDUNG DMAR CAN PHYAG MTSAN BZHI PA'I LHA TSOGS DGYES PAR BYED PA'I BSKANG BA 'DON DON DPAL DU 'GUGS PA'I LCAGS KYU ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI ^ 'JAM DPAL GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN YE SHES KYIS SBYAR BAS DON RAB TU 'GRUB CING 'GRUB PAR GYUR CIG , ,,KHYAD PAR DKAR GSUMMDAR GSUM BYAR BA YI, ,MCHOD GTOR RI LTAR SPUNGS SHING MTSO LTAR BSKYIL, ,ZAG MED BDUD RTZI'I BYIN NGO BO RLABS NAS, ,GUS BAS DBUL LO DGYES BZHIN BZHES SU GSOL,, ,,)
